content: day 24 / 24 starlight star bright abbreviations chain - chain fpdc - front post double_crochet difficulty mc - magic_ring fpsc - front post single_crochet time 30 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch fptc - front post treble_crochet material yarnart macrame double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only hook 3 5 mm half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as a first double_crochet double_crochet 11 slip_stitch blo to the first double_crochet of the round 12 total round 2 single_crochet chain as a first double_crochet fpdc over the same stitch double_crochet fpdc x 11 slip_stitch blo to the first fpdc of the round 24 total round 3 fpdc in the same stitch half_double_crochet single_crochet in the next stitch fpsc in the next stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet in the next stitch fpdc in the next stitch x 11 half_double_crochet single_crochet fpsc single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch blo to the first fpdc of the round 36 total round 4 single_crochet chain as a first double_crochet fptc over the same stitch double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet single_crochet fpsc single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fptc double_crochet all three in the next stitch x 11 half_double_crochet single_crochet fpsc single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch blo to the first fpdc of the round 48 total note for round 4 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet from previous round single_crochet in each single_crochet from previous round fpsc in each fpsc from previous round double_crochet fptc double_crochet in the fpdc from previous round round 5 chain fpdc in the fpdc from previous round chain slip_stitch 7 x 6 slip_stitch to the first stitch of the round 48 total cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the star congratulations you finished the 24th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event
